actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the John Jay National Historic Site in the State of New York.
short_title: John Jay National Historic Site Act

summary.text: John Jay National Historic Site Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the Peter Jay Property, Rye, New York. Directs the establishment of the John Jay National Historic Site to preserve the childhood home of John Jay, first Chief Justice of the United States.

titles.title: John Jay National Historic Site Act
A bill to provide for the establishment of the John Jay National Historic Site in the State of New York.
